official_title: A bill to protect the mails from disruption by prohibiting the transportation of mail on any airline which is a debtor in a case under title 11 of the United States Code, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Prohibits the United States Postal Service from entering into a contract with, or using, any air carrier that is a debtor in any case under Federal bankruptcy laws to transport the mail.

titles.title: A bill to protect the mails from disruption by prohibiting the transportation of mail on any airline which is a debtor in a case under title 11 of the United States Code, and for other purposes.
